name: createImage
description: Captures a private gold-master Image from a Linode Disk.

description.description: A detailed description of this Image.

disk_id.description: The ID of the Linode Disk that this Image will be created from.

label.description: A short title of this Image. Defaults to the label of the Disk it is being created from if not provided.

body.description: Information about the Image to create.

$ul: **created_by**: The name of the User who created this Image, or "linode" for public Images.
**deprecated**: Whether or not this Image is deprecated. Will only be true for deprecated public Images.
**description**: A detailed description of this Image.
**eol**: The date of the public Image's planned end of life. `None` for private Images.
**expiry**: Only Images created automatically from a deleted Linode (type=automatic) will expire.
**id**: The unique ID of this Image.
**is_public**: True if the Image is a public distribution image. False if Image is private Account-specific Image.
**label**: A short description of the Image.
**size**: The minimum size this Image needs to deploy. Size is in MB.
**status**: The current status of this Image.
**updated**: When this Image was last updated.
**vendor**: The upstream distribution vendor. `None` for private Images.
